TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_takuliway, title = takuliway, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/takuliway} }

S.FORM: sulit nu hulam:黃色的 tinaku a kamu takuliway 黃色的 = takuliyaway takuliyaway ku banges nu ci imelangay tu atay. .
solit no holam:黃色的 tinako a kamo takoliway 黃色的 = takoliyaway takoliyaway ko banges no ci imelangay to atay. .
